TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpRequestHeaders extends System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpHeaders
Public NotInheritable Class HttpRequestHeaders Inherits HttpHeaders
public ref class HttpRequestHeaders sealed : System::Net::Http::Headers::HttpHeaders

summary.span: Représente la collection d’en-têtes de requête, tel que défini dans le document RFC 2616.

span.span: Represents the collection of Request Headers as defined in RFC 2616.
